title: [Question] Will the 1st year result be out today?
content: According to the calendar of events , the results will be out today... Do they follow these dates or will it be mostly delayed?

comments.body: They are edging the results bro
They will 100% follow the date, but there may be variation in timing, they can release at 1 am or 1 pm that completely depends on them.
it never came lol its 9am next day
